text: athava, ninnal yatrayilavukayum elutan ale ‎kittatirikkukayumanenkil panayavastukkal ‎kaimariyal mati. ninnalilearal marrearale ‎vallatum visvasiccelpiccal ayal tanre ‎visvasyata palikkanam. tanre nathane ‎suksikkukayum venam. ninnal saksyam orikkalum ‎maraccuvekkarut. aratine maraccuvekkunnuvea, ‎avanre manas's papapankilaman. ninnal ‎ceyyunnatellam nannayariyunnavanan allahu. ‎
